description: After you return home from the ceremony you look around to see if anybody is watching. Nobody is. You rush to your office and lock the door. You hastily unfold the paper only to realise it is written in some sort of a cypher with signs you do not recognise. It would take a lot of time to figure out what is written on the paper.

options.description: I have to decipher it... personally.
I might need some help to decipher the paper.
I don't have time for that!

title: Deciphering the paper
